title: What Scares the Boogey Man?
description: A creature or being out of mankind's most ancient mythos. A concept that combines all of the unconscious fears that has haunted our species since its very beginnings. How would this nightmare manifest in our own day and age? And more importantly, what would IT be frightened of? The terrifying answers to these and many more creepy questions can be found in John Manning's chilling anthology, WHAT SCARES THE BOOGEYMAN.
author: John  Manning
